extension.description: A simple Kodi module that makes life easier for add-on developers relying on InputStream based add-ons and DRM playback.
extension.news: 2018.02.21 v0.3.3 + Load loop if it's a kernel module (thanks to mkreisl) + Fix legacy Widevine CDM update detection + inputstream_addon is now a public variable + Notify user that ARM64 needs 32-bit userspace + Improve logging + Cosmetics
